definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: By some estimates, more than a million flamingos flock to Bogoria.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，有一百多万只火鹤飞到博高瑞亚。

sentences.english: Flamingos flock to Kenya's Lake Bogoria.
sentences.chinese: 火鹤成群飞到肯尼亚的博高瑞亚湖。

sentences.english: But here, the lesser flamingo's primary food can grow.
sentences.chinese: 但在这里，火鹤的主要食物虽然不多但可以生长。

sentences.english: For the lesser flamingos, it is the staff of life.
sentences.chinese: 对于少数火鹤来说，这是生活必须品。

definition: (bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
three-legged Golden Crow that lives in the sun (in northeast Asian and Chinese mythology)/Korean: samjog'o
(bird species of China) golden eagle (Aquila chrysaetos)
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
